statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS review_count FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.6;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%good%';
SELECT review_id, customer_id FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.8 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, review_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score), MIN(sentiment_score), AVG(sentiment_score) FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_text, review_id FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_id > 5 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT review_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.5;

SELECT customer_reviews.review_id, customer_reviews.review_text, sentiment_analysis.sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews INNER JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customer_reviews.review_id = sentiment_analysis.review_id;

SELECT customer_reviews.review_text, sentiment_analysis.sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews LEFT JOIN sentiment_analysis ON customer_reviews.review_id = sentiment_analysis.review_id ORDER BY sentiment_analysis.sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews WHERE review_id = 1
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM CustomerReviews ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM CustomerReviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT word FROM SentimentDictionary LIMIT 5
SELECT feedback_id, review_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT review_text, review_date, sentiment_score FROM CustomerReviews WHERE review_id = 1
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date, sentiment_label FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE review_id = 2
SELECT word, sentiment_score FROM SentimentDictionary WHERE word_id = 3
SELECT review_text, customer_id FROM CustomerReviews ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_label FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date ASC
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM reviews WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, review_date FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, SUM(positive_score) AS total_positive_score FROM sentiment_scores GROUP BY review_id;
SELECT customer_id, total_reviews, average_sentiment FROM customer_sentiments WHERE average_sentiment > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM reviews WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_reviews, average_sentiment FROM customer_sentiments WHERE total_reviews > 10;
SELECT reviews.review_id, review_text, word_count FROM reviews JOIN review_statistics ON reviews.review_id = review_statistics.review_id;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_scores WHERE positive_score > 0.8 OR negative_score < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Reviews;
SELECT review_id, review_content, review_date FROM Customer_Reviews WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer_Details WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT tag_name FROM Review_Tags WHERE tag_id = 1;
SELECT review_id, sentiment_score FROM Sentiment_Analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Reviews;
SELECT review_content, review_date FROM Customer_Reviews WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer_Details WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT tag_name, review_id FROM Review_Tags ORDER BY tag_id DESC;
SELECT review_id, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM Sentiment_Analysis GROUP BY review_id;
